description: Contains information on how a sample was treated to become an induced pluripotent stem cell.
title: ipsc_induction_protocol

describedBy.description: The URL reference to the schema.

schema_version.description: The version number of the schema in major.minor.patch format.

schema_type.description: The type of the metadata schema entity.

provenance.description: Provenance information provided by the system.

induced_pluripotent_cell_induction_metho.description: Induction method applied to primary cell culture to induce pluripotent stem cell generation.
induced_pluripotent_cell_induction_metho.comment: Consider making this field an ontology in the future

ipsc_induction_factors.description: Induction factors added to primary cell culture to induce pluripotency.

induced_pluripotent_cell_induction_kit.description: Kit used to induce pluripotent stem cell generation.

pluripotency_test.description: Description of how pluripotency was tested in induced pluripotent stem cells.

percent_pluripotency.description: Percent of iPSCs that passed the pluripotency test.

pluripotency_vector_removed.description: Whether a viral vector was removed after induction.
pluripotency_vector_removed.example: Should be one of: yes, no, or unknown.

induced_pluripotent_cell_induction_produ.description: Whether the induced pluripotent stem cell was prepared in-house.
induced_pluripotent_cell_induction_produ.example: Should be one of: yes, no.

protocol_reagents.description: A list of additional purchased reagents used in this protocol.
